description: The Russian president says the army may be deployed as the number of coronavirus cases rises sharply.
title: Coronavirus: Russia's Putin may deploy army as cases surge
title_page: Coronavirus: Russia's Putin may deploy army as cases surge - BBC News
maintext: Lockdown measures have been introduced in the capital Moscow, the worst-hit area, as well as several other regions. People have been told to stay at home unless there is an essential reason for them to go out.
